allow:
Bash(git -C "C:\\Users\\cguid\\saint-match" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: pre-App Store code review bugfixes across 16 files

- Wrap JSON.parse in saint-match.tsx with try/catch to prevent crash on malformed route params
- Move consumeMatch\(\) after successful API call so failed matches don''t consume usage
- Add Alert on match failure instead of silent catch
- Guard initials split/filter against empty strings \(6 locations, 5 files\)
- Add user_novenas table to deleteUserAccount cleanup
- Reset streak freeze counter when streak breaks
- Cancel infinite animation on MilestoneBadge unmount to prevent memory leak
- Add onRequestClose to FlippableSaintCard modal for Android back button
- Remove console.log of auth data in LinkAccountModal
- Add transparent border to MoodSelector base button to prevent layout shift
- Register all 9 missing AsyncStorage keys in KEYS object so clearAllData is thorough
- Remove ghost Stack.Screen for deleted active-challenge route
- Add novena-celebration to auth layout with fade animation
- Add NSUserNotificationsUsageDescription to app.json for iOS
- Remove unused imports \(ensureAnonymousSession, incrementUsage, Easing, MILESTONES\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "C:\\Users\\cguid\\saint-match" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: add .npmrc with legacy-peer-deps for EAS iOS build

expo-router transitively pulls react-dom@19.2.4 which requires
react@^19.2.4, conflicting with the pinned react@19.1.0. npm ci
in the EAS build environment fails with ERESOLVE. legacy-peer-deps
skips strict peer resolution, matching how Expo projects typically
handle transitive web dependency conflicts.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
